dpaudiothru(8) System Manager's Manual dpaudiothru(8)

NAME

dpaudiothru — Display Port audio tool.

SYNOPSIS

dpaudiothru

DESCRIPTION

dpaudiothru Launched by dpd daemon to allow audio to play from host machine to target machine via display port. dpaudiothru should only be run via dpd daemon.

FILES

/usr/libexec/dpaudiothru
the daemon
/System/Library/LaunchDaemons/com.apple.dpd.plist
launchd configuration plist
February 18, 2009 Darwin
